thread.title: Roy
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Roy

author: Roy
title: Roy
text:
My first order with Freeze Pro was based only on them having the best price. But when the courier company messed up the delivery it was Freeze Pro's staff that went beyond what most other companies would do to ensure delivery. Juggling different addresses, dates and times were not a problem and they did exactly what they said they would! I have seen a lot of very poor customer service over the years and sadly less excellent customer service but Freeze Pro demonstrated the gold standard against which every other company should be judged!
Thanks very much, a pleasure to do business with you and whilst this was my first order it will not be my last!
